name: TABUMANIA Tabu Game & Charades
description:
TABUMANIA Charades Taboo Game Guess The Word

* HAVE UNLIMITED FUN WITH MORE THAN 10,000 CARDS
* ENJOY PLAYING CHARADES TABOO GAME WITH YOUR FRIENDS

END TO CARDS LOST!
END TO CARDS ARE SCATTERED!

With this application more than 10.000 taboo cards will be in your pocket and you will always have a great time with your friends.

The purpose of the game; The words at the top of the cards are to be told in the given time.

The words written under the words "forbidden words" are. When prohibited words are used, taboos are made and -1 points are written on the part of your team. That is to say, the aim is to find the team within the specified period without using the prohibited words.

A person from the opposing team should check whether the prohibited words are being used at this time.

You have 3 rusting rights.

Have fun.
